id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [LibreTiny PWM Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/libretiny_pwm.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin to use PWM on.

*See also: [LibreTiny PWM Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/libretiny_pwm.html#configuration-variables)*

frequency.docs:
**frequency**: The frequency to run the PWM with. Lower frequencies have more visual artifacts, but can represent much more colors. Defaults to `1000 Hz`.

*See also: [LibreTiny PWM Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/libretiny_pwm.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the PWM output to change.

*See also: [LibreTiny PWM Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/libretiny_pwm.html#output-libretiny-pwm-set-frequency-action)*

frequency.docs:
**[templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable), float**: The frequency to set in hertz.

*See also: [LibreTiny PWM Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/libretiny_pwm.html#output-libretiny-pwm-set-frequency-action)*

set_frequency.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) allows you to manually change the frequency of a LibreTiny PWM channel at runtime. Use cases include controlling a passive buzzer (for pitch control).

*See also: [`output.libretiny_pwm.set_frequency` Action](https://esphome.io/components/output/libretiny_pwm.html#output-libretiny-pwm-set-frequency-action)*
